alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Price County through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prentice, or 25 miles south of Park Falls, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phillips, Prentice, Catawba, Pike Lake, Cranberry Lake, Wilson Lake Near Phillips, and Musser Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
